text: The Grow 2 () is a 2015 Chinese animated adventure comedy film directed by Ha Lei. It was released in China on May 29, 2015. The film was preceded by The Grow (2012). ==Voice cast== *Yu Li *Wu Tian Hao *Rong Rong *Zhang Yuan ==Reception== By June 2, 2015, the film had earned at the Chinese box office. ==References== Category:2010s adventure comedy films Category:2015 animated films Category:2015 films Category:Animated adventure films Category:Animated comedy films Category:Chinese animated films Category:Chinese films Category:2015 comedy films
title: The Grow 2
